steam_ugc_send_query: This function can be used to send a query request. You first define the query using the appropriate steam_ugc_create_query_*() functions which will return a "query Handle". This handle is then used to set filters etc.... before being used in this function to send off the query request. The function returns a unique async ID value which can be used to check the details correctly in the Steam Async event. This event will have the async_load DS map which will be populated with the following key/value pairs:

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:91-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "id" - The async ID returned by the function that triggered the event

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:92-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "result" - The result of the operation (a real value). This will either be the GML constant ugc_result_success or some other real number. So you should check for this constant to ensure that the call was successful, and if otherwise somthing has not worked correctly. The rest of the possible values returned are shown as the result of the Steam "EResult" value and you should see steamclientpublic.h in the SDK headers for all 89 possible values.

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:94-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "event_type" - The string "ugc_query"

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:95-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "num_results" - The number of results returned (max 50 )

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:96-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "total_matching" - The total number of matching results

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:97-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "cached_data" - Indicates whether this data was retrieved from the local on-disk cache or not (will be either true or false)

steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.head.title: steam_ugc_send_query.htm+html.body.ul.li:98-5
steam_ugc_send_query: "results_list" - A DS list index index, where each list entry is a DS Map index containing details of the particular item
